exceptions.exn: Cannot turn inductive ring_theory into an evaluable reference.

exceptions.tactic: destruct R_is_ring as [R_eq Rone_eq Rzero_eq Rminus_eq Rmult_eq Rplus_eq Ropp_eq].
exceptions.exn: The reference R_is_ring was not found in the current environment.
The reference Rplus_eq was not found in the current environment.
The reference Rplus_eq was not found in the current environment.
The reference Rmult_eq was not found in the current environment.
The reference Rmult_eq was not found in the current environment.
The reference Rminus_eq was not found in the current environment.

In environment R : Type Rzero, Rone : R Rplus, Rmult, Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R -> R x, y, u : M22 Radd_0_l : forall x : R, z ⊕ x = x Radd_comm : forall x y : R, x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x Radd_assoc : forall x y z : R, x ⊕ (y ⊕ z) = x ⊕ y ⊕ z Rmul_1_l : forall x : R, o ⊗ x = x Rmul_comm : forall x y : R, x ⊗ y = y ⊗ x Rmul_assoc : forall x y z : R, x ⊗ (y ⊗ z) = x ⊗ y ⊗ z Rdistr_l : forall x y z : R, (x ⊕ y) ⊗ z = x ⊗ z ⊕ y ⊗ z Rsub_def : forall x y : R, Rminus x y = x ⊕ ∸ y Ropp_def : forall x : R, x ⊕ ∸ x = z Unable to unify "x ⊠ y ⊠ u" with "x ⊠ (y ⊠ u)".

original: intros x y u. unfold ring_theory in R_is_ring. destruct R_is_ring as [R_eq Rone_eq Rzero_eq Rminus_eq Rmult_eq Rplus_eq Ropp_eq]. rewrite -> Rplus_eq. rewrite -> Rplus_eq. rewrite <- Rmult_eq. rewrite <- Rmult_eq. rewrite <- Rminus_eq. reflexivity.
